psychological_notes: The question has become autonomic function, as natural and necessary as heartbeat. Evan no longer struggles with it but lives it unconsciously until attention turns toward it. His mastery shown through ability to hold space for others' questioning without interfering.
philosophical_underpinning: Essential questions must remain alive; answered questions die
therapeutic_direction: Integration so complete it becomes unconscious competence
